turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need two large Veggie Lovers pizzas with gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $48, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, you are ordering 2 large veggie lover pizzas with gluten free crusts.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. That is correct. Please place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be picking up, having it delivered, or dining in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me restaurant to pick it up from. Give me an address.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, bella luna's is located on 123 main street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. I will go I will go there right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizza will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you. None None for now. You, too. Bye-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
